caption:
The photograph depicts a vivid scene at what appears to be a landfill or dump site. It shows a large pile of garbage covering the ground, consisting of miscellaneous debris and waste materials that have a varied appearance in texture and color, predominantly muted tones of brown, grey, and green, with occasional flashes of brighter colors like red or blue from different types of waste.

A focal point of the image is a large, yellow bulldozer moving on top of the garbage pile. The bulldozer is emitting dark black smoke from a stack, suggesting it is powered by diesel or a similar fuel. The bulldozer appears to be in operation, moving or compressing the garbage as evidenced by the dust and debris disturbed around its tracks, which adds a dynamic element to the scene.

The background of the photograph is relatively clear, showing a structure that resembles a container or another heavy piece of machinery at the site. The sky is very bright and mostly clear, suggesting the photo was taken on a sunny day. This lighting casts stark shadows and highlights the textures of the garbage and machinery, enhancing the industrial feel of the scene.
title: In last stage of city waste disposal process, garbage brought by barge from Manhattan is dumped from carts at outer edges of Staten Island landfill.  Previously deposited refuse is already smoldering
